name: Maruti Fronx
description: The price of Maruti Fronx, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 7.51  - 13.04 Lakh. It is available in 16 variants, with engine options ranging from 998 to 1197 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Fronx comes with 6 airbags. Maruti Fronx has a ground clearance of 190 mm  and is available in 10 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 20.01 to 28.51 kmpl for Fronx.
